headline: CSX (CSX) and CN Team Up to Enhance Intermodal Service to Nashville
summary: CSX (CSX) recently signed a Memorandum of Understanding with CN to develop a new intermodal service into Nashville, Tennessee. This initiative aims to bolster supply chain solutions with an all-rail alternative for container movement, enhancing speed, reliability, and sustainability. Despite this announcement, CSX's share price remained essentially flat over the past week, aligning with the broader market's modest 1.4% ascent and the record highs in the S&P 500 and Nasdaq. The company's...

headline: CSX and the 2025 Medal of Honor Celebration Partner to Hold Historic Reenactment of the Great Locomotive Chase
summary: To officially kick-off the 2025 Medal of Honor Celebration in Chattanooga, the Coolidge National Medal of Honor Heritage Center and the Congressional Medal of Honor Society, in partnership with CSX, will bring history to life with the first ever immersive reenactment of The Great Locomotive Chase on Tuesday, September 30, 2025. This once-in-a-lifetime event–which is sponsored by the Gary W. Rollins Foundation–will have nearly 20 Medal of Honor Recipients and other invited guests on a special CSX

headline: CN, CSX join on new Nashville intermodal service
summary: Canadian National and CSX are collaborating on direct intermodal service from the West Coast of Canada to the heart of the U.S. Mid-south region. The post CN, CSX join on new Nashville intermodal service appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: CSX Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer to Address J.P. Morgan U.S. All Stars Conference
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., Sept. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CSX Corp. (NASDAQ: CSX) President and Chief Executive Officer, Joe Hinrichs, and Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Sean Pelkey, will address J.P. Morgan’s U.S. All Stars Conference in London on Wednesday, September 17, at 10 a.m. British Summer Time (5 a.m. EDT). This address will be broadcast live via webcast at http://investors.csx.com. A replay will be available following the conclusion of this event. This announcement
